title: World-Class Maldives Fairmont Private Island Pool Villa with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Roundtrip Seaplane Transfers
description:
Embrace private island paradise among the shimmering waters and coral-filled reefs of the Shaviyani Atoll with a five-star villa stay at Fairmont Maldives, Sirru Fen Fushi. Boasting 120 beachy-chic villas, the resort effortlessly blends signature Fairmont luxury with this island's soul-soaring natural majesty. Savour sun-kissed days spent exploring countless underwater kingdoms in the Shaviyani Atoll - one of the largest resort reefs in the Maldives - or splashing by the resort’s endless mirage-like infinity pool, the longest in the archipelago. Return to exquisite beachside Japanese plates at Kata, seafront seafood at Azure and traditional Maldivian dishes at Raha Market.

A lifetime of luxury adventures awaits at Fairmont Maldives, Sirru Fen Fushi, all backed by the resort’s unmatched commitment to sustainability. Discover the resort’s unique Coralarium, a coral regeneration project and art installation unlike any other in the world, or tour the Sustainability Lab to glimpse the island’s efforts in recycling and regeneration in the heart of paradise.
offer_address: Sirru Fen Fushi, Shaviyani Atoll 20209, Maldives

title: World-Class Indulgence at the Fairmont Maldives with Return Seaplane Transfers
description: Indulge in world-class Fairmont luxury in one of the most sought-after holiday destinations on earth at the exquisite Fairmont Maldives Sirru Fen Fushi. A secluded jewel in the Shaviyani Atoll, this five-star resort offers beautiful rustic chic villas dotted across the beach and azure lagoon, plus a 200m long infinity pool, a dreamy spa and gourmet local and international cuisine. Your escape includes return transfers between Male and the resort (by sea plane), daily buffet breakfast and nightly buffet dinner.
location_description: Fairmont Maldives Sirru Fen Fushi - February 2019
offer_address: Unit 2B Faamdheyrige, Orchid Magu, Male’ 20209, Maldives, Shaviyani Atoll 20209, Maldives

title: All-Inclusive Fairmont Maldives with Free-Flow Drinks & Return Transfers from Malé
description: All-inclusive island paradise is redefined at the iconic Fairmont Maldives Sirru Fen Fushi, a five-star oasis whose name literally translates to ‘secret water island’. Reached via an included one-hour flight and speedboat transfer from Malé, this Maldives sanctuary is deliciously remote and allows you to bask in uninterrupted horizon views from the 200m infinity pool, melt away in the Maldives’ largest lagoon and marvel at the stars above without a glimmer of light pollution. Indulge in world-class Fairmont villa luxury, swim in your very own private villa pool and discover the coral cays of the shimmering Shaviyani Atoll just beyond the island’s 40-acre stretch of pristine sand.
offer_address: Sirru Fen Fushi, Shaviyani Atoll 20209, Maldives

title: World-Class Fairmont Indulgence with All-Inclusive Dining and Return Transfers
description: Indulge in world-class Fairmont luxury in one of the world's most sought-after holiday destinations at the exquisite Fairmont Maldives Sirru Fen Fushi. A secluded jewel in the Shaviyani Atoll, this five-star resort offers beautiful rustic-chic villas dotted across the beach and azure lagoon, plus a 200m long infinity pool, a dreamy spa and gourmet local and international cuisine. Your escape includes all meals, with a lavish buffet breakfast every day, plus lunch and dinner at your choice of any three of the resort's excellent restaurants, one hour of unlimited drinks with dinner and VIP return domestic flight and speedboat transfers.
location_description: Fairmont Maldives Sirru Fen Fushi November 2019
offer_address: Unit 2B Faamdheyrige, Orchid Magu, Male’ 20209, Maldives, Shaviyani Atoll 20209, Maldives
